name: Skora Sports
overview:
Skora Sports is a sports data and technology company headquartered in Jamaica.

Skora distributes credible sports data to fans and professionals in the sports industry, across an array of sports. This data includes fixtures, results and individual player statistics.

Skora’s data is used in industries such as Education, Entertainment, Media and Broadcasting.

The existing problem is that Caribbean sports data is poorly recorded, which makes it lose its integrity and accessibility. Skora’s mission is to efficiently record the Caribbean’s sports data and to make it accessible to everyone via the use of technology.

To achieve this, Skora will develop the following products and services: SportsDesk software – SportsDesk a sports administration software that helps sports associations and league organisers to manage: schedules & fixtures, player/team registrations, generate match cards and create reports.
